about_the_game:
When a mysterious voice lures a young girl into a secluded home promising her candy, her friends must venture inside to save her, armed with nothing more the powers granted to them by their Halloween costumes.

Will they be able to uncover the dark truth buried within, or will they crumble like broken mirrors?

Features

  • Enjoy a horror-comedy visual novel with references to certain IPs taking place in the world of Echoes of G, an upcoming visual novel!

  • Select one of two routes as you search through a shady home on Halloween night. Choose between the tomboyish Misako Harima and the elegant Princess Quinn on your quest to find their friend, Echo!

  • Make choices that will decide the fate of every single character and unlock multiple different endings. Choose wisely, as your decisions can lead to a good or bad ending for each of them!

  • Gorgeous artwork illustrated in a (mainly) monochrome style!

  • Uncover the darkness that plagues Halloween!

WARNING: Contains brief instances of flashing lights.
